EmailTemplate.name: Itex 2016 Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: 15 minutes gets you a free copier return!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
BREAKING NEWS! 15 minutes gets you a FREE copier return! Stop by our meeting room at ITEX (#M3) to get the details.
Scheduled Returns Service is now available from ReturnCenter, a leading provider of lease return logistics in the copier industry.
This complete end-of-lease return solution includes: • Sending the Letter of Intent and obtaining the Return Authorization • A copier cover and dated ID label for each machine • Monitoring and scheduling for on-time returns • A flat rate for nationwide logistics
Scheduled Returns Service saves you time and money, reduces risk, and helps your customers avoid late fees and penalties.
Register today for dealer pricing: www.returncenter.com/srs
Set an appointment or get directions to the booth by contacting: Angel Gonzalez - Cell: (917) 763-9617 or angel.gonzalez@returncenter.com.
Join us for free drinks Tuesday evening: 8:00 until closing Hilton Ft. Lauderdale Beach Resort S3 Restaurant & Bar 505 N Fort Lauderdale Beach Blvd
We hope to see you there! ___________________________________________________________________
If you we miss you at ITEX, please stop by our booth at BTA's Spring Break in New Orleans March 18-19!
